DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.
Shuffle a card from your hand into your draw pile.
Halves incoming damage. Lose #b1 Stealth at the end of your turn and when playing an #yAttack.
Increases the damage of your next #yAttack by #b20% per stack. Reduced by #b1 whenever a non-Attack card is played.
Reduces Max HP while applied. Your Unreality is removed at the end of combat.
Plasma Wisps are #b1 cost #yEthereal Attack cards.
Paradoxes are #b0 cost Skill cards that apply #yUnreality to enemies and you, then draw a card.
